pages.text: Alloying can be used to improve your ingot gains, each tier increasing how much and what you can alloy.$(br2)But before you can start alloying you will need to setup a structure for your forge that you will see in the next page.

pages.title: Building a Forge
pages.text: You can make an Alloy Forge out of 5 materials: Bricks, Stone Bricks, Blackstone, Deepslate, and End Stone.$(br2)-Bricks and Stone bricks are Tier 1$(br2)-Blackstone Deepslate and Prismarine are Tier 2$(br2)-Endstone is Tier 3.
